application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1. Olive Tree	Rear Garden:Reduce height to 2.5m and lateral spread by 1m to a natural rounded form.The tree's current height is 8m and crown spread is 4m - After the proposed works, the tree's height is 5.5m and the crown spread is 3m T2. Holly Tree	Rear Garden:Reduce height by 3m and trim hard to conical form. The tree's current height is 11m and crown spread is 5m - After the proposed works, the tree's height is 8m and the crown spread is 4mT3. Yew Tree	Rear Garden:Trim height by 1m only to round off and match remainder of tree.The tree's current height is 12m and crown spread is 10m - After the proposed works, the tree's height is 11m and the crown spread is 10mT4. Magnolia grandiflora	Rear Garden:Reduce height and spread by 1.5m - 2m to a rounded natural form.	The tree's current height is 9m and crown spread is 7m - After the proposed works, the tree's height is 7m and the crown spread is 5.5m.T5. Apple Tree	Rear Garden:Reduce new growth back to previous form. (2m height and 2m lateral spread)The tree's current height is 8m and crown spread is 8m - After the proposed works, the tree's height is 6m and the crown spread is 6mT6. Hazel Tree	Rear Garden:Reduce height and spread by 1.5m to a rounded natural form.The tree's current height is 6m and crown spread is 6m - After the proposed works, the tree's height is 4.5m and the crown spread is 5m
